prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that changes with the weather and has a playful personality.
I want a cute, amorphous Pokemon that can transform based on its environment.
Generate a tiny Pokemon with a round body and cloud-like features that loves the rain.
Make a weather-themed Pokemon with a soft, gray appearance and a cheerful demeanor.
Imagine a small, shapeshifting creature that embodies the essence of different weather types.
Design a unique Pokemon that reflects the four seasons through its visual traits and colors.
Show me a weather-based Pokemon that has a gentle personality and enjoys sunny days.
